plot outline: Based in U.K., Anjini Dutt teaches music to children, does private tutoring, and lives in a palatial house with her husband, Rajeev, who attempts in vain to convince her to sell the house. After she loses her tutoring job, the duo decide to rent a room and accordingly place a newspaper advertisement. This is how they meet Sanjay, a Pub Singer, and decide to rent a room to him for three years and ensure that he pays the entire amount in advance. While Rajeev is busy with his project, he neglects Anjini, who befriends Sanjay, both fall in love and become intimate. They decide they belong to each other and Anjini decides to ask Rajeev for a divorce. It is this decision that will shatter and change everyone's lives forever.
title: Three: Love, Lies, Betrayal
plot: A lonely and neglected wife has an affair with her tenant.
